metadata.title: CVE-2019-8955 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In Tor before 0.3.3.12, 0.3.4.x before 0.3.4.11, 0.3.5.x before 0.3.5.8,and 0.4.x before 0.4.0.2-alpha, remote denial of service against Torclients and relays can occur via memory exhaustion in the KIST cellscheduler.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8955` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tor - 0.3.5.8-1
tor-geoipdb - 0.3.5.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tor package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.5.8-1').
